name: Margherita
description: Classic Margherita pizza with a perfect blend of tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni
description: Indulge in the savory goodness of Pepperoni pizza featuring zesty tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and spicy pepperoni slices.

name: Vegetarian
description: A delightful Vegetarian pizza topped with colorful bell peppers, olives, and savory mushrooms on a bed of mozzarella and tomato sauce.

name: Hawaiian
description: Escape to the tropics with the Hawaiian pizza featuring succulent ham, sweet pineapple, and gooey mozzarella.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Savor the smoky flavor of BBQ Chicken pizza with tangy BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onion, and fresh cilantro.

name: Mushroom Delight
description: Indulge in the rich and creamy Mushroom Delight pizza, featuring cream sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, spinach, and garlic.

name: Classic Supreme
description: The Classic Supreme pizza is a flavorful combination of tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, green peppers, onions, and black olives.

name: Veggie Feast
description: Experience a Veggie Feast with a variety of colorful toppings, including bell peppers, red onion, black olives, and tomatoes.

name: Spicy Chicken Ranch
description: Kick up the heat with Spicy Chicken Ranch pizza, featuring creamy ranch sauce, mozzarella, spicy chicken, jalapeños, and red onion.

name: Pesto Delight
description: Delight your taste buds with the Pesto Delight pizza, showcasing pesto sauce, mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, artichokes, and feta.

name: Buffalo Chicken
description: Experience the bold flavors of Buffalo Chicken pizza, featuring buffalo sauce, mozzarella, chicken, red onion, and blue cheese.

name: White Garlic
description: Savor the richness of White Garlic pizza with creamy white garlic sauce, mozzarella, spinach, artichokes, and feta.

name: Mexican Fiesta
description: Bring the party to your taste buds with Mexican Fiesta pizza, featuring salsa, mozzarella, ground beef, jalapeños, red onion, and tomatoes.

name: Mediterranean
description: Embark on a culinary journey with the Mediterranean pizza, adorned with tomato sauce, mozzarella, kalamata olives, feta, red onion, and tomatoes.

name: Bacon Lover's
description: For bacon enthusiasts, the Bacon Lover's pizza is a mouthwatering delight with tomato sauce, mozzarella, bacon, red onion, and tomatoes.

name: Capricciosa
description: Savor the authentic flavors of Capricciosa pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, mushrooms, black olives, and artichokes.

name: Spinach and Feta
description: Experience the perfect blend of freshness and flavor with Spinach and Feta pizza, featuring tomato sauce, mozzarella, spinach, feta, red onion, and garlic.

name: Supreme Deluxe
description: Indulge in the ultimate pizza experience with Supreme Deluxe, boasting a medley of tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, black olives, and mushrooms.

name: Truffle Mushroom
description: Elevate your taste buds with the luxurious Truffle Mushroom pizza, featuring truffle oil, mozzarella, mushrooms, caramelized onions, and parmesan.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Experience the creamy goodness of Chicken Alfredo pizza, showcasing alfredo sauce, mozzarella, chicken, broccoli, and parmesan.

name: Greek Gyro
description: Take your taste buds on a journey with the Greek Gyro pizza, featuring tzatziki sauce, mozzarella, gyro meat, red onion, tomatoes, and feta.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Delight in the flavors of the sea with Shrimp Scampi pizza, adorned with garlic butter sauce, mozzarella, shrimp, tomatoes, and parsley.

name: Barbecue Bacon
description: Satisfy your barbecue cravings with Barbecue Bacon pizza, featuring BBQ sauce, mozzarella, bacon, red onion, and cilantro.

name: Pineapple Paradise
description: Transport your taste buds to a tropical paradise with Pineapple Paradise pizza, featuring tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, pineapple, and jalapeños.

name: Artichoke Delight
description: Indulge in the Artichoke Delight pizza, boasting white garlic sauce, mozzarella, artichokes, spinach, and feta for a truly delightful experience.

name: Taco Fiesta
description: Spice up your taste buds with Taco Fiesta pizza, featuring salsa, mozzarella, seasoned ground beef, crisp lettuce, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese.

name: Pesto Chicken
description: Elevate your pizza experience with Pesto Chicken, featuring pesto sauce, mozzarella, chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, and artichokes.

name: Seafood Delight
description: Dive into a Seafood Delight pizza, crafted with garlic butter sauce, mozzarella, shrimp, scallops, clams, and mussels for a taste of the ocean.

name: Four Cheese
description: Experience the richness of Four Cheese pizza, featuring a blend of tomato sauce, mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and feta for a cheese lover's delight.

name: Meat Lovers
description: Indulge in the ultimate meaty feast with Meat Lovers pizza, featuring tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.
